alert.note: Alert for Giles; Pulaski; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 27 at 9:08AM EDT until July 27 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban area and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Virginia and southeast West Virginia, including the following counties, in southwest Virginia, Bland, Giles, Pulaski and Tazewell. In southeast West Virginia, Mercer. * WHEN...Until 1215 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 908 AM EDT, the public reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bluefield, Bastian, Rocky Gap, Pocahontas, Bramwell and Clear Fork. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
